library(nlme)
library(lme4)
library(lmerTest)
library(emmeans)
library(broom)
library(beeswarm)
library("readxl")


my_data <- read_excel("/Users/jamesmcgregor/Desktop/SPNratios_longformat.xlsx")
my_data

my_data_LME = lmer(Ratio ~ Treatment + (1 | Experiment_Date), data = my_data)
summary(my_data_LME)

emm <- emmeans(my_data_LME,"Treatment")
contrast(emm, 'pairwise')
anova(my_data_LME)
